email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the mid to high 40s. Can you check if there’s any room for adjustment? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can adjust the freight rate to $49.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. The adjusted rate is more in line with our expectations. We’re good to proceed at $49.50 per metric ton. Can you confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the draft charter party, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the finalization. Please confirm once the charter party is signed. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the charter party has been signed and finalized. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for the 15-20 October laycan. I’ll keep you updated on any developments. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah
